article_title: Obama Won't Force Through a Ton of Regulations in His Final Year
article_text:

2. To license a Fortune cover, order reprint or e-print copies of an article or cover, or license an accolade, please contact PARS International at www.timeincreprints.com.

twitter.title: Here’s Why President Obama Won’t Force Through a Ton of Reg...
twitter.description: President Obama’s final State of the Union address on Tuesday may be most remarkable for what it doesn’t include—any major new policy initiatives. Presidents typically use the primetime natio...

article_metadata.keywords: obama, business, state of the union, barack obama, white house, regulations, economic growth
article_metadata.sailthru.tags: Barack Obama, Executive Orders, State of the Union
article_metadata.news_keywords: Obama, business, State of the Union, Barack Obama, White House, regulations, economic growth
article_metadata.sailthru.title: Here’s Why President Obama Won’t Force Through a Ton of Regulations in His Final Year
article_metadata.description: Obama has consistently taken heat from corporate interests for burdening them with new rules.
article_metadata.sailthru.description: Obama has consistently taken heat from corporate interests for burdening them with regulations. But his final year will not likely add much to that.
